title: No more FIRES?!? - NZXT H1 V2
tags: Does the H1 cause fires still?
description: Get 20% OFF + Free Shipping @Manscaped at    NZXT's H1 had a rocky lifespan with potential fires due to a faulty design at the PCI-e riser. Well, they fixed it now with the NZXT H1 v2 by designing a new PCI-e riser from the group up, and it's a little bit larger that can fit 3000 series of GPU. So hopefully, this one doesn't spark flames.  Check out the NZXT H1 v2 at   Buy Intel i7-11700k CPU   Amazon:    Best Buy:    Newegg:   Buy ROG Strix Z590-I Gaming WiFi 6E LGA 1200   Amazon:    B&H Photo:   Buy Trident Z Royal DDR4 3600 CL18 (2x16gb)   Amazon:    Newegg:   Buy Crucial P5 M.2 500GB   Amazon:    Newegg:   Buy ASUS ROG STRIX NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3090 White OC Edition   Amazon:    Newegg:   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.
